mapper.insert: insert into companycaroption (ccar_car_id, car_code, com_id, ccar_use_yn, car_fuel, ccar_blackbox_yn, ccar_smoke_yn, ccar_rear_camera_yn, ccar_rear_sence_yn, ccar_navi_yn, ccar_sun_roof_yn, ccar_bluetooth_yn, ccar_aux_yn, ccar_smartkey_yn, ccar_rentalcount, ccar_normal_price, ccar_weekend_price, ccar_peak_price, ccar_s_peak_price, ccar_arrear, comcar_regdate) values( #{ccarCarId},#{carCode}, #{comId}, #{ccarUseYn}, #{carFuel}, #{ccarBlackboxYn}, #{ccarSmokeYn}, #{ccarRearCameraYn}, #{ccarRearSenceYn}, #{ccarNaviYn}, #{ccarSunRoofYn}, #{ccarBluetoothYn}, #{ccarAuxYn}, #{ccarSmartkeyYn}, #{ccarRentalcount}, #{ccarNormalPrice}, #{ccarWeekendPrice}, #{ccarPeakPrice}, #{ccarSPeakPrice}, #{ccarArrear}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from companycaroption where comcar_outdate is null
select c.*, cco.* from car c right join companycaroption cco on c.car_code = cco.car_code where cco.comcar_outdate is null
select c.*, cco.* from car c right join companycaroption cco on c.car_code = cco.car_code where cco.ccar_car_id=#{cco.ccar_car_id}

select * from ( select rownum as RNUM, LIST.* from ( select c.car_name, c.car_inc, c.car_size, c.car_trans, c.car_type, cco.* from car c join companycaroption cco on c.car_code = cco.car_code where cco.com_id=#{companyId}
and cco.comcar_outdate is null
order by c.car_name asc
and cco.ccar_use_yn = 'Y' order by cco.ccar_car_id asc
and cco.ccar_use_yn = 'N' order by cco.ccar_car_id asc
order by cco.ccar_car_id asc
order by cco.car_fuel desc
order by cco.comcar_regdate desc
order by cco.comcar_regdate desc
)LIST )
where RNUM>#{firstRecordIndex} and RNUM <=#{firstRecordIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
select count(*) from car c join companycaroption cco on c.car_code = cco.car_code where com_id= #{companyId} and comcar_outdate is null
select count(*) from com_reservView where com_id= #{companyId} and comcar_outdate is null
select count(*) from com_reservView where com_id= #{companyId} and comcar_outdate is null and to_char(reserv_start_date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
select count(*) from com_reservView where com_id= #{companyId} and comcar_outdate is null and to_char(reserv_end_date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')

select count(*) from com_reservview
where reserv_start_date <=sysdate and sysdate<=reserv_end_date
mapper.update: update companycaroption set ccar_car_id=#{ccarCarId}, ccar_use_yn=#{ccarUseYn},ccar_blackbox_yn=#{ccarBlackboxYn}, ccar_rear_camera_yn=#{ccarRearCameraYn},ccar_smoke_yn=#{ccarSmokeYn}, ccar_rear_sence_yn=#{ccarRearSenceYn},ccar_navi_yn=#{ccarNaviYn},ccar_sun_roof_yn=#{ccarSunRoofYn},ccar_bluetooth_yn=#{ccarBluetoothYn}, ccar_aux_yn=#{ccarAuxYn},ccar_smartkey_yn=#{ccarSmartkeyYn}, ccar_normal_price= #{ccarNormalPrice}, ccar_weekend_price= #{ccarWeekendPrice}, ccar_peak_price= #{ccarPeakPrice}, ccar_s_peak_price= #{ccarSPeakPrice} where ccar_car_id=#{ccarCarId} and com_id=#{comId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from companycaroption where Ccar_car_id = #{ccarCarId }

select * from ( select rownum as RNUM ,LIST.* from ( select car_name, ccar_car_id, reserv_start_date, res_u_name, res_drv_name, res_drv_tel1, res_drv_tel2, res_drv_tel3, pay_condition from com_reservview where com_id= #{companyId} and to_char(reserv_start_date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
order by reserv_start_date
and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') < to_char(reserv_start_date,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')

order by ccar_car_id desc
order by reserv_start_date
)LIST )
where RNUM>#{firstRecordIndex} and RNUM <=#{firstRecordIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
